362120.name: H-Hour: Worlds Elite - Soundtrack
362120.description:
The soundtrack for H-Hour: World's Elite was composed in the tradition of SOCOM 2 musical style, with a dash of Modern Warfare 3 and Gears of War 3 sound. It was performed with a live orchestra, choir, and modern percussion arrangements.

The soundtrack features 12 tracks with a running time of 33 minutes. Our award-winning composer, Penka Kouneva has previous worked on Prince of Persia: Forgotten Sands (co-composer), Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen (team composer) and Gears of War 2, 3 (Lead arranger, additional music). Enjoy! Follow Penka on twitter: @PenkaKouneva and Facebook.
362120.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
